channel.title: What types of colors are there? ex: @gre@, @red@
channel.description: Wanting to know all the colors I can do like that, and also, is that java? :o

item.title: What types of colors are there? ex: @gre@, @red@
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:9, topic:450863”][quote author=Redemtion link=topic=553739.msg4057802#msg4057802 date=1343144789]
That’s all that i could think of off the top of my head.
[/quote]

[quote author=HcoJustin link=topic=553739.msg4056798#msg4056798 date=1343051901]
Its only in old engine clients, and there’s a list of them in the client.

http://code.google.com/p/rename317/source/browse/trunk/src/rs2/RSFont.java#243
[/quote][/quote]
Sheeeeeeiiiiiit, didnt know some went up to 3. Lol

Read full topic

item.title: What types of colors are there? ex: @gre@, @red@
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

@red@ @dre@ @or1@ @or2@ @gre@ @dgr@ @lgr@ @blu@ @mag@ @cya@ @yel@ @bla@ @str@ - strikethrough @whi@
That’s all that i could think of off the top of my head.

Read full topic

item.title: What types of colors are there? ex: @gre@, @red@
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Scyth_:

Its java, and in private servers, im pretty sure you can do just about ever average color, but it has to be the 3 first letters. Also, you can do @xxx@

Its only in old engine clients, and there’s a list of them in the client.

http://code.google.com/p/rename317/source/browse/trunk/src/rs2/RSFont.java#243

Read full topic
